outputs.output_descr: The project provides for a national assessment of capacities in Seychelles to implement the various environmental obligations under environmental conventions. It will assess capacities at systemic, institutional and individual levels. The project will support the countries to build capacity in order to be able to meet its obligations under the various environmental conventions.

project_descr: National Capacity Self-Assesment for Global Environment Management (NCSA)
project_title: National Capacity Self Assessment in Seychelles
